content.caption: 🚀 Hey, trailblazers! Remember, every small step counts on your journey to greatness. Whether it's tackling that project or making time for self-care, you’re one decision away from a breakthrough! 💪✨ Swipe through for your daily dose of motivation, and share your favorite tip in the comments! Let's uplift each other! 🌟 #MotivationMonday #KeepPushing

avatar_data.prompt: A realistic portrait photo of a 25-35 year old person, friendly, professional, engaging personality, professional headshot quality, studio lighting, high resolution, photorealistic, detailed facial features, natural expression, suitable for social media profile, modern style

content.media_prompt: A motivation social media post image, featuring the same person from the avatar, related to: 🚀 Hey, trailblazers! Remember, every small step counts on your journey to greatness.
